ing: 1/4 cup prepared yellow mustard (such as French'sÂ®)
2 tablespoons ground smoked black pepper (such as McCormickÂ® SmokehouseÂ®)
2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®)
des: "Give your ketchup a twang by adding prepared mustard. I prefer French'sÂ® but dijon-style will work as well. I also like to add a couple of tablespoons of ground black pepper. SmokehouseÂ® pepper is the best!"
ins: Stir ketchup, mustard, smoked pepper, onion granules, hot pepper sauce, and granulated garlic together in a bowl; funnel into a squeezable bottle and refrigerate between uses.
